ing: 1/2 fluid ounce cherry liqueur (such as Cherry HeeringÂ®)
2 dashes chocolate or mole bitters (such as BittermensÂ® or Fee BrothersÂ®)
des: "Based on the Red Ant cocktail created by a NYC bartender. Be sure to use a good quality mezcal. The small amount of it here makes a big difference. I like brandied cherries for the garnish."
ins: Put ice in a cocktail shaker. Pour in whiskey, Cherry Heering, and kirschwasser. Then spoon in the mezcal and add a couple dashes of bitters. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with cherries.
